headline: PTC Brings AI-Powered PLM to Hannover Messe 2025 with Windchill AI
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) will preview its Windchill® AI product lifecycle management (PLM) assistant, a generative AI-powered PLM offering, at Hannover Messe 2025. Windchill AI leverages all product data stored in Windchill to enable engineers to access information, make decisions, and develop their products more efficiently. Windchill AI will be demonstrated alongside PTC's Codebeamer® AI offering for requirements management and ServiceMax® AI offering for field service management.
